media.caption: We were on top of Pikes Peak, Colorado

text.headline: Trisha and Tuhin 6th Anniversary
text.text: Wow, this is amazing, where did the six year go? Trisha always says I forget things, well, this is a journal that I intend to keep with stories. I missed lot's of our stories- but I will put them all in here little by little :). I have put together snippets of our journey here on our 6th anniversary

text.headline: Trisha; Minding her own business
text.text: Ah..How life was so wonderful :P

text.headline: Tuhin ; Minding his own business
text.text: Ah..How life was so wondeful

text.headline: Marriage ! BAM
text.text: Then, We decided to get married..now what ??

text.headline: Internship in WalmartLabs
text.text: We spent our first eid on San Mateo,California, while I was doing my Internship in WalmartLabs. It was wonderful 3 months (; we used to fight a lot too :) ), but I do miss those time.

text.headline: Visit to SF
text.text: It was a wonderful day, we were so stupid to brought only light cloths.

text.headline: Yosemite
text.text: Visited Yosemite with Friends, yes, we fought that day because I don't want to take pictures , how stupide those fights are :)

text.headline: UC Berkley
text.text: Impressed by the architecture of this wonderful instituion

text.headline: Colorado
text.text: We visited Aspen colorado with our Family, lots of snow, some weather hardships, wonderful memories. Oh, we got robbed aroudn the same timeline, whew, that was a story to tell when I meet you nex time

text.headline: Lake Tahoe with Saiful Bhai and Family
text.text: We went to Lake Tahoe with Saiful Bhai, Urmi Apu, Prianka was there. First Boat Trip in Tahoe

text.headline: Camping
text.text: We spent 4 hours driving this camping destination, with BBQ, Adda, can't wait to go camping again

text.headline: Solvang
text.text: We went to Solvang on our way back from LA , it was a nice Danish City

text.headline: LAS Vegas Trip
text.text: Ah Las Vegas !! lots of fun and pain :), our car stopped on the highway, hey, we survived. would like to go back again :)

text.headline: Prianka Wedding
text.text: We all went to Texas to celebrate Prianka's wedding. we were so happy to see Subho bhai and Prianka together

text.headline: EID 2018
text.text: It was at Rifat's Place- Trisha looks so beautful in this Saree

text.headline: Shasta Lake Trip
text.text: Prianka and Shubhao bhai visited us and we went to Lake shashta , we played a lot of Sequence on the way, and we beat the girls like alot :)

text.headline: Kolkata Trip
text.text: This is my first trip to India, we went to Shanti Niketon, we enjoyed wonderful food - good times, humid weather

text.headline: Eid with Family
text.text: After years, we were able to celebrate Eid with Family

text.headline: Hawaiiiiii
text.text: I was interviewing for job at that time - otherwise we would have enjoyed much more. I promise Trisha , we will go back there again, never seen such wonderful beaches in anywhere - and the tropical forest, and the pineapple, and so much more.

text.headline: Hawaiiiiii - II
text.text: I was interviewing for job at that time - otherwise we would have enjoyed much more. I promise Trisha , we will go back there again, never seen such wonderful beaches in anywhere - and the tropical forest, and the pineapple, and so much more.

text.headline: Covid 19
text.text: We planned to go to Europe that year - yeah, we got the VISA and all, COVID happened. So, we decided to grow Jhinga, Potol Alu Kumra in your backyard. We will go there ------

text.headline: Pregnancy
text.text: Pregnancy was such stressful time - but we were overjoyed when we first saw litle girl's face in hospital bed

text.headline: Audbita
text.text: Our little girl is now 3 months old, I can't wait to take her to all the places that Trisha and I went, this journey will continue....

text.headline: HAPPY ANNIVERSARY
text.text: It has been amazing 6 years of marriage - I can't wait to see what future brings - may be I will write a song next time titled - 'You,me and Audbita' , P.S. I love you.
